lenders.name: Exsila AG
lenders.loan_because:
Der Vorteil an Exsila ist, dass jedes Mitglied an einem Kreislauf teilnimmt. Artikel werden verkauft, gekauft und wieder zum Verkauf eingestellt. Ohne den stetigen Kreislauf würde Exsila nicht funktionieren.

Auch bei Kiva spielt der Kreislauf eine sehr wichtige Rolle. Kiva vermittelt Mikrokredite an Unternehmerinnen und Unternehmer in Entwicklungsländern. Ob du lieber einen Fischer in Senegal, eine Lehrerin in Guatemala oder einen Verkäufer in Kambodscha unterstützen willst, entscheidest du selbst. Das Geld, welches du investierst, bleibt im Kreislauf, denn sobald die Unternehmer den Kredit zurückgezahlt haben, kann das Geld wieder für neue Investments auf Kiva eingesetzt werden.

Entwicklungshilfe mit Mikrokrediten ist eine grossartige Sache und macht mit Kiva richtig Spass.

lenders.name: Valerie
lenders.loan_because: Entrepreneurship is the backbone of our society. I live my life everyday with gratitude for those who have influenced my life along the way. My parents, teachers and good friends supported me through good times and bad. From that I realize that even the smallest effort of support can go a long way in this world, and in the life of someone who just needs to know that someone out there is rooting for them.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop, maintain and manage a spatial database of a City's Utility, Maps, and various other datasets that are required in day to day business. I am going to school to become and EMT, and hope to become a reserve/volunteer EMT in times of need.

lenders.name: LINDA  PACULA
lenders.loan_because: My beloved Ukrainian Father and Mother-in-Laws came to American with nothing but determination to work hard to make a good life for their family. They did. Very few people helped them.  They earned everything they have by working hard.  Three years after they were in this country, there was an opportunity to take over a business in a small town nearby when the owner was unexpectedly killed and the widow offered my Father-in-law  to buy a  little store. He jumped at  the chance to have something of his own and soon turned it into a butcher shop and began making his our sausage...something he knew from the old country.   They were open 7 days a week, 7 am - 7 pm.   They raised two sons. I married the oldest and we had two sons who grew up in the meat business.  Dido and Baba Pacula did the family proud.  Baba can still be found in the store ..85 years young, greetings customers and giving cooking advise. I loan in memory of my Father-in-Law, Walter Pacula.
lenders.occupational_info: Now I've retired from being the 'best wiener twister in Winesburg'.  I take care of the bookkeeping needs for our two meat businesses.

lenders.occupational_info: The Career Explorer site has an aptitude test and career education information to help people find career training that suits their skills.

lenders.name: Technical Schools Guide
lenders.loan_because: At Technical Schools Guide we like to lend on Kiva because we believe in helping others achieve their best future.
lenders.occupational_info: Our Technical-Schools-Guide.com site proudly offers an ever-expanding list of technical classes and technical degree programs, from graphic design to computer programming. We assist people in their journey for a Technical School.

lenders.name: Thubten
lenders.loan_because: Like so many other things that I enjoy doing, I do it because it feels good.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a full-time writer and editor and part-time English teacher and yoga instructor.

lenders.name: Allen & Karen
lenders.loan_because: We are all connected; "everything that lives, is holy."
lenders.occupational_info: Allen is a retired college teacher; Karen teaches in an elementary school.

lenders.name: Carmen
lenders.loan_because: I believe in entrepreneurship. I try to do my part by helping small businesses, be it by providing low cost marketing or lending through KIVA.
lenders.occupational_info:
Connect with me: 
-Twitter - http://twitter.com/Carmen_JL
-LinkedIn- http://www.linkedin.com/in/carmenlarreynaga

lenders.name: Career College Central
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people change their futures whether its through providing information to the Career College Sector of Higher Education or lending to those starting new ventures to improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: The CareerCollegeCentral.com team offers industry news, information and resources on how to effectively run a world-class educational institution. This includes subjects like admissions issues, regulatory issues, training, marketing and much more.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because:
The Internet is eliminating the barriers between compassion and need.
Mt. 25:40
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that makes and sells toys throughout the world. My job is to sell them to parents of American children who want to buy toys directly from the factory. We do this using the Internet.

lenders.name: Steffen
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Liam
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people.

lenders.name: Conrad
lenders.loan_because: I don't know why I loan. Maybe it's because since I have learned I don't really have a great need for material things, except for the real necessities in life, I felt wealthier in spirit. I only feel it is imperative that I spread this joyous feeling to people around the world, those who are fueled only by their passion and trust in their practical ideas.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an actor, writer, producer, and director. Though that may sound glamorous to a lot of people I meet, at the core, I am merely an artist. I have the same issues, problems, and rewards very similar to any entrepreneurs around the world. I deal with my craft, I create a product, and I sell and distribute my wares to make a living. Some people market durable goods. I market durable stories and, hopefully, eternal moments of enlightenment.

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: Give a man a fish, he eats for a day.  Invest a little start up dough in his business...

lenders.name: Kurt
lenders.loan_because: It's exciting when many small investors pool their money for loans to people economically disadvantaged.
lenders.occupational_info: Operation's supervisor for a large theater where plays and music events are performed.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: I believe in these programs.

lenders.name: Craig
lenders.loan_because: I like reminders that people are trustworthy - it helps me believe in people despite what I read in the newspaper.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: I firmly believe that this is the best way to help entrepreneurs in developing countries realize their dreams, support their families, and boost their countries' economies.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a recent college graduate working at a TV station called Current TV.  I'm responsible for helping and moderating Current TV's internet community.

lenders.name: Francis
lenders.occupation: Retired Fire Chief of Collingwood Ontario
lenders.loan_because: I wish to help others to improve their self respect and worth.  I admire all who strive to improve their social and financial status when the journey seems impossible.

lenders.name: Bev
lenders.loan_because: its important to help each other succeed. Small businesses are key to keeping local flavors.
lenders.occupational_info: Graphic designer/ magazine publisher

lenders.name: Isabel and Michael
lenders.loan_because: My husband and I love people! I come from a third world country, El Salvador and I know how how difficult it is to be successful if you do not have the means. Now we have the means so why not help someone out!!!
lenders.occupational_info: We both work office jobs  (very boreing!) in New York City.

lenders.name: Jones Family
lenders.loan_because:
It is a great way to allow people to help themselves.  I admire how hard they work.

My three children are 6,9, and 10 years old are donating some of their allowance and learning about the free market economy.  It is a great way to teach about the value of money.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell airplanes.

lenders.name: Frances
lenders.loan_because: we are all in this together.

lenders.name: Tim Seibert
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who strive to better themselves and their families.

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a fair chance to realize their dreams, put food on the table and support their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an electric utility company and help the company plan for new infrastructure to bring power (including renewable energy) to people's homes and businesses.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people that are trying to help themselves. While in the Navy I participated in several humanitarian medical missions. The people we provided medical care to were very greatfull, those of us that participated appreciated their graditude. It was in the navy that I developed the need and willingness to help people that are trying to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist physicians in surgery by preparing instrument trays, setting up the surgical suite and passing instruments. My hobbies include fishing and traveling. This picture was taken in Montero, Bolivia South America - June 2007

lenders.name: Lee
lenders.loan_because:
"Freely you have received, freely give." - Matthew 10:8
"To whom much is given, much is expected". - Luke 12:48
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the Sales department of a multinational electronic component manufacturing company in southern California.

lenders.name: Karin

lenders.occupational_info: I help technology companies make good decisions.

lenders.name: Leslie
lenders.loan_because: I got a gift certificate for a Chanukah gift from a wonderful friend.
lenders.occupational_info: Iwork with children from age 3 to age 13, teaching them to read, write, and do math. They love creative activities that develop their hearts and minds.

lenders.name: Aashish
lenders.loan_because: It is a sustainable model of giving.

lenders.name: Garland Family
lenders.loan_because: We want to help others, especially in countries where their income is so low and their opportunity is so poor.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I feel so fortunate to be able to help people through my job as a physical therapist.  With Kiva, I hope to make a difference on a larger scale.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: I can and I should. I have been self employed since 2002 and have been fortunate enough to have help along the way. This is my way of returning the favor.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the owner of a small business doing custom invitations and graphic design.

lenders.name: Eva
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of a small act.
lenders.occupational_info: I help scientists get the money they need to do their research.

lenders.name: Canadian Angels
lenders.loan_because:
We want to help break the cycle of poverty by sharing  our good fortune  with those who are striving to help themselves. 

Mahatma Gandhi  once said  "the planet provides enough to fill each person's need but not each person's greed."
lenders.occupational_info: We are a group of Canadian Bankers helping people in financial distress due to job loss, seasonal employment, etc. manage their money in order to make  timely payments and maintain a  healthy standard of living.

lenders.name: Darwin
lenders.loan_because: I'm blessed with privileges and I believe all people deserve a chance to make it on their own.
lenders.occupational_info: I photograph landscapes and nature, like beaches, sunsets, mountains and animals, and I sell my work as framed and unframed prints, cards and calendars.

lenders.name: Alice

lenders.name: Guillaume

lenders.occupational_info: I use words on paper to try and help  people to better their lives.

lenders.name: Bismark

lenders.occupational_info: Bismark Ampofo runs www.free-home-based-business-info.com the site that provides you with the quality of free information you need to start your internet based home business on the right path... including in depth home based business reviews.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I see a world without borders. I believe we are a global community.
